# Nerveskitter (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** None (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 146

*You suffuse your ally with a brief, blue glow. He jerks away from you, as if he can anticipate your next action.*

You cast this spell when you and your party roll for initiative. You enhance the subjectâ€™s reactions in combat, granting it a +5 bonus on its initiative check for the current encounter. If the subject does not make an initiative check within 1 round, this spell has no effect.

**GM Note**

This spell is particularly effective when cast in conjunction with *[[Combat Readiness (Spell)|combat readiness]]*.
